meanings.sent1: She enjoys divulgating her secrets to her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The journalist was divulgating the breaking news to the public.
meanings.sent3: The magician was divulgating his tricks to the audience, much to their delight.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise was divulgating its beauty over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was divulgating the answer to the puzzled student.

meanings.definition: The act of disclosing or revealing information (noun)
meanings.sent1: His divulgating of classified documents caused a stir in the office.
meanings.sent2: The divulgating of company secrets led to a breach of trust.
meanings.sent3: The divulgating of the surprise party plans almost ruined the surprise.
meanings.sent4: The divulgating of the treasure map's location sparked a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent5: The divulgating of the recipe for the famous dish made everyone eager to try it.
